Talt and her yearly visits!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Talt and her yearly visits!
By Maki on Thursday, June 16, 2005 - 01:14 pm:

I won the emperor's cup and have already been visited by the doctor and talt, but when do they come again? I understand its a yearly visit but what month and week do they visit in??

By Bethegus on Thursday, June 16, 2005 - 08:11 pm:

October 2nd week I think. That's how it is for me.

By Maki on Thursday, June 16, 2005 - 10:08 pm:

Thanks ^^ Too bad its in october, i was hoping it would be january 1st but oh well, it just makes things more confusing. ^^thanks again.

By Muzau on Wednesday, March 15, 2006 - 02:23 pm:

Wait, Why does she come?

By Lil_Literalist on Monday, December 18, 2006 - 07:11 pm:

She comes to make sure that your monster isn't sick. I actually let a monster stay sick until she came around to see what she would do, and she does indeed say whatever your monster is sick with, and that you should come in.
